BuyerGroup.name: BuyerGroup
BuyerGroup.description: Associates group qualifiers (entitlements, price books, promotions, and shipping methods) with buyer members based on buyer account ID or on the localized language and currency of the market browsed in a webstore.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the buyer group.

OwnerId.description: ID of the creator of this object.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type of the version

Role.description: Determines a fixed or dynamic relationship to the language and currency that products, promotions, and entitlements are displayed in.
